Question: Soundwell Electronic Products Guangdong Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Soundwell Electronic Products Guangdong Co., Ltd

LG Soundbar S95TR

- 9.1.5-channel sound system
- Dolby Atmos, Dolby Vision, and DTS:X compatibility
- 65-inch soundbar with three up-firing speakers, rear speakers, and a subwoofer
- Wireless connectivity to LG 4K TVs via WOWcast
- Immersive and detailed audio experience
Summary_cn:
广东省声音电子产品有限公司

LG Soundbar S95TR

- 9.1.5声道音响系统
- 兼容Dolby Atmos、Dolby Vision和DTS:X
- 65英寸的声音杆带有三个向上发声扬声器、后置扬声器和低音炮
- 通过WOWcast与LG 4K电视无线连接
- 沉浸式和细致的音频体验
